user.title: Connect to Firewalla
user.description:
Set up Firewalla integration. You need to create a personal access token in your Firewalla MSP account. Make sure to enter your correct subdomain (the part before .firewalla.net).

{error_info}

error.auth: Authentication failed. Please check your subdomain and API token. Make sure the API is accessible.

abort.already_configured: This Firewalla instance is already configured
